00071 template<typename Engine1, size_t s1,
00072          typename Engine2, size_t s2=0u>
00073   class xor_combine_engine
00074 {
00075   public:
00076     // types
00077 
00081     typedef Engine1 base1_type;
00082 
00086     typedef Engine2 base2_type;
00087 
00091     typedef typename thrust::detail::eval_if<
00092       (sizeof(typename base2_type::result_type) > sizeof(typename base1_type::result_type)),
00093       thrust::detail::identity_<typename base2_type::result_type>,
00094       thrust::detail::identity_<typename base1_type::result_type>
00095     >::type result_type;
00096     
00099     static const size_t shift1 = s1;
00100 
00103     static const size_t shift2 = s2;
00104 
00107     static const result_type min = 0;
00108 
00111     static const result_type max =
00112       detail::xor_combine_engine_max<
00113         Engine1, s1, Engine2, s2, result_type
00114       >::value;
